title: Matrix
text: What is the matrix corresponding to this system of equations?

title: Approach $$1$$
text: We can solve for the inverse of a matrix by augmenting with the identity matrix. This works well for matrices of small and large size

title: Approach $$2$$
text: We can solve for the inverse of the matrix using matrix multiplication. This will involve writing the inverse matrix as a collection of variables which we can then solve after simplifying the matrix product. This works well for $$2$$ by $$2$$ matrices but is not very effective for bigger matrices.

title: Approach $$3$$
text: We can directly use the formula for an inverse. This has a simple soultion for $$2$$ by $$2$$ matrices but the formula is complex for bigger matrices and so other approaches may be better.

title: Final matrix
text: Using any of the previous approaches what is the matrix inverse?
